name: FILM 165E
title: Chicana/o Cinema, Video
description: Examines emergence of Chicana/o cinema and video from a place of social displacement, resistance, and affirmation. Looks at Chicana/o representation and spectatorship as it pertains to ethnicity, class, gender, and the beginning of a new Chicana/o film aesthetic.

pre_req_data.text: Prerequisite(s): FILM 20A.  Enrollment is restricted to sophomores, juniors, and seniors.
